channel.title: Making a new server need tut
channel.description:
ok i need a tut for making people that log in lvl 3 and one that only permits the admin to spawn items
if anyone could help me that would be really great
note . iam on hybridscape

item.source: Making a new server need tut

item.title: Making a new server need tut
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Well, first, go into the client.java and search for the commands you want like you would search for "banuser" if you wanted to edit banuser command (Include the quotation marks, it will find the command instantly like that), Now, beside it, it should say something like this && playerRights >= 3 Or something along those lines, as long as it is 3, only the owner can use the command, if it is 2, admin and better can, 1, only mod and better, and 0, anyone can. Another thing that might help is if you put if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser") && playerRights >= 3 && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Patchumz") || playerName.equals.IgnoreCase("Dan") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jesusaramis")))
Thats would make it only people with level 3 rights AND they have to have the names “Patchumz”, “Dan”, or “Jesusaramis”. I dunno about the starting level, i’ll search my client.java for you :P.

Read full topic
